summary.span: 表示可以個別由索引存取之 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了如所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全如所述， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為唯讀以改善所做的多個物件之間共用效能、 複製，並變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements**oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件元素語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
